core_meaning: Square between Pluto and Moon drives friction/work. Pluto: . Moon: emotion, care, habits, home, public mood, mother. General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.

facets.career: Public reception, brand sentiment, consistency. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.relationships: Bonding, nurturance, emotional safety. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.money: Cyclic cashflow, consumer sentiment. Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.health_adj: Hydration, sleep, digestion; stress sensitivity. Emphasis: friction/work.

risk_notes: Friction escalating into conflict; respect pacing and boundaries.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: friction/work).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: friction/work).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: friction/work).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: friction/work).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: friction/work).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Pluto: act, iterate, measure; Moon: nurture, align routines, soft-launch; tone: friction/work).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.
